subject: Horse Racing
Halls of Fame
organizations: National Museum of Racing Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Edgar Prado, seventh on the career earnings list and only the fourth rider with more than 500 victories in a season when he rode 535 in 1997, was named as part of a class of six for induction into the National Museum of Racing Hall of Fame. Prado rode Barbaro to a Kentucky Derby victory in 2006.
